title: 启动崩溃
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Surprise! Haha. Well, this is awkward.

Time: 19-6-7 上午10:05
Description: Initializing game

org.lwjgl.LWJGLException: Pixel format not accelerated
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsPeerInfo.nChoosePixelFormat(Native Method)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsPeerInfo.choosePixelFormat(WindowsPeerInfo.java:52)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsDisplay.createWindow(WindowsDisplay.java:247)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.createWindow(Display.java:306)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.create(Display.java:848)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.create(Display.java:757)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.create(Display.java:739)
        at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.createDisplay(Minecraft.java:648)
        at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.startGame(Minecraft.java:484)
        at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.run(Minecraft.java:402)
        at net.minecraft.client.main.Main.main(Main.java:113)
        at Start.main(Start.java:11)


A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-- Head --
Stacktrace:
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsPeerInfo.nChoosePixelFormat(Native Method)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsPeerInfo.choosePixelFormat(WindowsPeerInfo.java:52)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsDisplay.createWindow(WindowsDisplay.java:247)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.createWindow(Display.java:306)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.create(Display.java:848)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.create(Display.java:757)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.create(Display.java:739)
        at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.createDisplay(Minecraft.java:648)
        at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.startGame(Minecraft.java:484)

-- Initialization --
Details:
Stacktrace:
        at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.run(Minecraft.java:402)
        at net.minecraft.client.main.Main.main(Main.java:113)
        at Start.main(Start.java:11)

-- System Details --
Details:
        Minecraft Version: 1.8.8
        Operating System: Windows 10 (amd64) version 10.0
        CPU: <unknown>
        Java Version: 1.8.0_131, Oracle Corporation

        Memory: 903268816 bytes (861 MB) / 1056309248 bytes (1007 MB) up to 1056309248 bytes (1007 MB)
        JVM Flags: 3 total; -Xincgc -Xmx1024M -Xms1024M
        IntCache: cache: 0, tcache: 0, allocated: 0, tallocated: 0
        Launched Version: mcp
        LWJGL: 2.9.4
        OpenGL: ~~ERROR~~ RuntimeException: No OpenGL context found in the current thread.
        GL Caps:

        Is Modded: Definitely; Client brand changed to 'fml,forge'
        Type: Client (map_client.txt)

replies.author: skyliye
replies.txt_content:
楼主是笔记本电脑吗，建议上笔记本电脑官网搜索对应型号（你笔记本背面有贴型号的标签）下载安装显卡驱动程序。第三方驱动安装软件如驱动精灵驱动人生可能导致驱动不兼容。
另可在设备管理器查看显示适配器有没有正常工作，故障的情况下会显示一个感叹号

guoyongfu 发表于 2019-6-7 10:21
显卡驱动更新下？
最新版的，但我记得 以前的旧版可以，但是旧版的备份我删了

replies.author: XY__MengXing
replies.txt_content: 删了新的 去官网重新下载
启动器内存给大点试试
